duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure compliance with safety and quality requirements, maintaining a safe and clean work area.
Navigate, print, and process pick lists, as well as pull and place parts on sequence carts.
Replenish KAN BAN pans, detect quality concerns in parts, and reclassify new rack locations for parts.
Deliver sequenced parts to fabrication areas, ensuring inventory accuracy through computer transactions.
Complete safety checklist and be responsible for forklift and racking maintenance.
Continually lift and move up to 40 pounds, as well as perform physical tasks to meet job functions.
Operate fork truck and use equipment and parts knowledge to ensure timely delivery and comply with processes and methods.
Perform data entry tasks and use scanning equipment for tracking and verification.
Comply with EEO guidelines, ensuring an inclusive and diverse workplace.
